yaml_format_wrong: Configuration is in an invalid YAML format.
name: Name
confirm_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete the {{kind}} <0>{{target}}</0>?
label: Label
create_failed_tip: Please address the following issues and try again:
save_failed_tip: Please address the following issues and try again:
save_replicas_success_toast: The expected number of replicas was edited successfully
save_replicas_failed_toast: Failed to edit the expected number of replicas
port_mapping_title_tooltip: The mapping between the service port and the pod port.
in_cluster_desc: Services of types ClusterIP, NodePort, and LoadBalancer will show the ClusterIP field, which represents a virtual IP address only accessible within the cluster.
in_cluster_ip_desc: If ClusterIP is a headless service, it will display as blank.
in_cluster_external_name_desc: For an ExternalName type service, it displays DNS records.
out_cluster_ip_desc: ClusterIP doesn't support external cluster access.
out_cluster_node_port_desc: For a NodePort type service, it displays Node IP：nodeport.
out_cluster_lb_desc: For a LoadBalancer type service, it displays ingress[*].ip.
out_external_name_desc: For an ExternalName type service, it displays external-ip.
only_support_one_yaml: Only one YAML configuration is supported at a time.
exit_yaml_tip: If you go back to the form, any changes made to the YAML file will be lost.
edit_label_success_toast: Successfully edited the label for the resource {{name}}
edit_annotation_success_toast: Successfully edited the annotation for the resource {{name}}
edit_distribute_storage_failed_toast: Failed to edit the capacity allocation
edit_node_taint_success_toast: Successfully edited the taint for the node {{name}}
change_form_mode_alert: Switching from YAML editing to form editing will discard all changes made to the YAML file.
pvc_storage_reduce_limit: The value cannot be less than the current value.
prefix_format_rule_1: DNS subdomain: a series of DNS labels separated by dots (.)
prefix_format_rule_3: Followed by a slash (/), meaning the content before the first slash (/) is the prefix. If the slash (/) is present, the prefix cannot be empty.
name_format_rule_1: Includes letters, numbers, hyphens (-), underscores (_), or dots (.)
name_format_rule_2: Must start and end with a letter or number
taint_effect_NoSchedule_tooltip_1: Pods running on the node will not be evicted.
taint_effect_NoSchedule_tooltip_2: New pods will not be scheduled onto tainted nodes unless there is a matching tolerance.
taint_effect_NoExecute_tooltip_1: Pods without taint tolerance will be immediately evicted.
taint_effect_NoExecute_tooltip_2: Pods with tolerance but no duration set will continue running.
taint_effect_NoExecute_tooltip_3: Pods with tolerance and a duration set will run for the specified time and then be evicted.
taint_effect_PreferNoSchedule_tooltip: The control plane will try to avoid scheduling pods without taint tolerance to the node, but full avoidance isn't guaranteed.
length_limit: The length of {{ label }} should be between {{ minLength }} and {{ maxLength }} characters.
rf1123_name_format_error: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (-) are supported, and the name must start and end with a lowercase letter or number.
input_correct_port: Please fill in a valid port number.
